content.detailedDescription: I was walking to school when i saw a strange thing in the sky. it was like 1-2 pm. it was hovering. first i tought it was a drone but it wasnt it was to big for a drone. it was hovering for like 3 minits when it flew away. i was nervously when i saw it. it was flying over a tree then i didnt saw it again.
content.summary: Looked like a cd

content.detailedDescription:
Hi

i have been observing the above for approximately the last fortnight.

they are both constant in their presence and numerous.

their size , material and purpose is unknown.

likely of enormous size, when the sun is used as a comparison scale.

they are usually configured as a bunch of 'balls' with a single bright light in the middle, but this can vary....Several lights, larger bunches and lights joined together. lights forming a line etc.

i have pictorial evidence of a blackberry landing on or near the suns surface and ejecting several balls onto the sun. they then seem to sink in to the sun.

i have a virtual library of images, but will send you a representative sample to illustrate said ufo's.

the significance for mankind would be incalculable, assuming the images, which are derived from the soho satelite have not been altered by nasa prior to transmission (for whatever reason).

i am mystified as to why i have seen no other report of the above phenomena, given that they are, and have been in great number around our sun for quite some time.

perhaps others have noticed and reported them to you?

please give me some feedback when possible.

kind regards
your witness
content.summary: Numerous ufo's around and on sun. dubbed 'blackberries' due to appearance.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi

i have been observing and recording the above from data transmitted by the soho satellite since about 10-11 june 2016.

it would surprise me if you had not had any similar reports for they have been most common. 

it is probably best that i simply send you the images and let you analyse them, but i'll make some comments as follows:

for convenience, and utilising my own terms of reference i have dubbed them 'blackberries', but they are are certainly otherwise unrelated to any fruit and are in fact thoroughly alien, and somewhat disquieting due to their number, size and overall 'alien' presentation and behaviour.

they are likely enormous, using the sun as a comparison scale.

material unknown, purpose unknown.

each has at least one powerfull light source emanating from its centre. the light varies in its characteristics and intensity.

over the course of several weeks i have seen many variations in presentation of these 'craft-entities'. 

they vary from several joined up together with their lights making a line, to single objects with a single light carrying a bunch of 'balls' which is the most common manifestation.

the balls seem to be able to change shape. they remind me of the matal mercury but this is just an initial impression.

i have pictorial evidence of these craft on occasion alighting on or near the surface of the sun and ejecting-depositing several balls over the suns surface, and certain images indicating that these 'balls' then sink into the sun... for whatever reason.

i have accumulated a virtual library of evidence based on my observations in recent weeks, but will include the choicest shots which can hopefully give credence to my aforementioned descriptions.

i feel this information is highly significant (for mankind) in that it portrays et activity around our sun on an enormous and continuing scale.

of course, one wonders how come nowone else seems to be noticing or commenting on all this... why?

the significance of what i am reporting can not be underestimated, assuming that the images have not been manipulated prior to release by nasa (for whatever reason).

kind regards
your witness
content.summary: Numerous ufo's around sun during mid -late june 2016. dubbed 'blackberries' due to appearance.

content.detailedDescription:
My buddy and i went to sandy's (beach on the south east shore of oahu, hawaii).  

we were sitting in the back/bed of his truck while watching the surf, and trying to chat with the pretty girls in the next vehicle.

i took a pic of the ocean, trying to "capture" a wave before it broke.

a month or two later i decided to post the pic on facebook, and as i looked at the image (obviously enlarged on my facebook page, versus my cell phone screen)...  i noticed the disc shape.

i enlarged the photo and cannot see any wings. a tail, rotator blades, etc.  it has a "penny" shape to it.  

unfortunately, i don't remember seeing anything that day in the sky.




not sure if it is actually a ufo...  but like i stated before, i cannot find any other identifying marks (wings, rotator blades, etc.)
content.summary: I didn't realize it was a ufo until uploading this pic on my facebook account.  zoomed in and didn't see wings, tail, etc.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the highway and saw a bright flashing white light flying our way. i slowed down to look at it. i had a passenger with me. the aircraft had a triangle front; the flashing light was on the tip of the triangle. connected to the triangle were straight sides. so it was all one piece, triangle top and rectangle back. from the road we were looking up at it and it looked flat. it was almost 10p.M. so it was dark out and when the light would rythmically flash on and off, we could see it. it was flying at a slow speed going north along the highway. we were heading south. it was on our left side. when the light would flash it looked steel grey with cross "bars" and panels that looked like square windows. there were 2 or 3 "window panels" on each side with the "bars" between. it looked like there were thin green lines of light, straight lines outlining part of it. it was flying in the direction of the front light. we didn't stop and kept going. my passenger turned to watch it continue on its path. it was flying above the power lines, a little bit higher. we didn't know what it was. i was very interested in what it was but as we were driving to our destination and this probably only lasted a minute or two i didn't stop. i didn't have much time to think about it. my passenger felt scared of it and didn't want to stop. we have no idea what it was. it was nothing like what we've ever seen before. my drawing is obviously not as good as in person but it just gives an idea of what it was like. i called the missouri university science and technology center to see if they had any experiments going or whatever and the night watchwoman said they didn't. i tried to call fort leonard wood military base but that was not working out. so i wanted to report this and ended up here.
content.summary: I was driving down the highway and saw a flashing light coming towards us moving at a slow speed, we didnt stop but slowed down to look at it.

content.detailedDescription: I always look out my bedroom window before going to bed for peice of mind, saw two red lights hovering at the tree line near a neighbors house, lights took off so quickly then dipped below tree line.
content.summary: Looked out bedroom window and saw two red lights hovering at treeline then making a sharp turn and disappear quickly

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out on our deck having a cigarette. i was looking up at the stars when i saw a bright white light come from the east over our yard (at a distance) and over our trees. there was no sound whats so ever. as it was crossing there was a tail of white light behind it. although there was a light you could still see a distinct oval shape within the white light. no trees moved, nor was there any wind. it was completely silent. not a cloud in the sky either. when i saw this craft i knew it was as i have seen others before, but never like this one. it jist went up at a slow incline but you could tell it was going extremely fast. i lost sight of it when it went over the trees to the west. my husband was looking at our dogs so didnt see it. when in first saw this i was in awe of this. i instantly got goose bumps and was shaking at what in had just seen. i said to my husband "babe babe did you just see that! it was amazing! are you serious you didnt just see that!" im just really hoping others got to see this as well. i dont know what it was doing here but seemed like it was low enough to start out that it had been hovering somewhere in the east for some reason. again it was nothing like what ive seen before. ive seen comets, jets, falling stars, satellites, and spot light before in my life and this was 100% different and not just because ot was rising not falling but the light was so bright amd beautiful.  thank you.
content.summary: Bright white light in the shape of an oval with large white light tail behind, no sound, raising up.

content.detailedDescription: At 10:40 pm i was outside at the balcony looking at jupiter, suddenly i a saw  like a shooting star switching colors blue red and white and then it made a sudden change of direction 15° north west in the direction to the leo constellation but making different short turns, like deciding where to go, the event took about 13 seconds  then the object i'm sure, camouflaged  like a light dimmed down fast.
content.summary: Watching jupiter a light beaming came out of nowhere descending  change path easily 15 degrees nw and fast  towards leo constellation

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend were driving one evening in a rural area ne of rayne, la. we were at a stop sign on charlie arceneaux rd (present day name) at hwy 98 (grand prairie road) facing in a southerly direction. we were on an upgrade at this point, so when we first noticed the light we could see it about 2/3's up through the windshield. it appeared to be changing colors from red to yellow to green to blue in a sort of rotating repetitive fashion. neither of us had ever seen anything like it before. we are both science minded and after a brief discussion about what it could be, i suggested that it might be something like a super nova whose light was just reaching us now. that seemed as reasonable as anything else we could come up with so we continued driving. 

a short while later, we found ourselves headed south on ebenezer road (which is sw of rayne) and noticed that the light was still there. we stopped and were trying to decide if it was still in the same general direction from where we first saw the light(s). as we were talking, the object turned into a brilliant bright white light and suddenly took off in a easterly direction. my friend wanted to stay stopped and watch, but, knowing the area and that there was a eastbound gravel road (theriot road) just ahead of us, i chose to chase it instead. i was traveling in excess of 70 mph down this gravel road, but the object was getting way ahead of us. it appeared to have passed a treeline about 3 or 4 miles from where the chase began, stopped again and went back to rotating the red-yellow-green-blue lights. 

when we reached the stop sign at hwy 35 (abbeville hwy) and started watching it again. right after we stopped, we observed a bright white light about 7 or 8 inches wide come down just to the right of my vehicle. i noticed it first at a slightly higher level and told my friend to look. he saw able to see it as it went past the passenger window. it wasn't like a continuous beam or anything like that. it had a beginning and an end, but disappeared after leaving a short trailing tail and then completely after we assume it made contact with the ground. we did not see any hole or scorch marks on the ground where it seemed to make contact. there was no noise at any point of this experience. with the size of the light, and how close it would have been if it had been a helicopter, we would have definitely heard the noise. there was nothing but silence. 

we had a friend that lived further south down hwy 35, so we decided to go back to my home (in the opposite direction), pick up my small telescope and go out to our friend's home. it was only a 90 power scope, but we didn't know what else to do. although we were a mile or two further south when we arrived at our friend's home, the light was still due east of our location. i focused my telescope on the object, but what i saw was simply a round solid orb. but, with such a low power scope, it could not really focus in on the object leaving me to believe that it was much further away than it looked. the funny thing was that as soon as my friend took his turn to look through the scope, he told me that it wasn't there. as we looked up the object had returned to the bright white light and had taken off again in a easterly direction. at this point two our friends also saw the change in color and the object moving away.

although i can not verify this story, later in the week, another friend told us that he had seen the same light(s) from abbeville, la., a town about 30 miles away from our sighting. he further commented that he had called a local airport and was told that they had nothing on radar in that area. my hesitation to believe his story is that he could have easily been told what we had seen by our other friends at the house and may have simply decided to add his own story to it. 

anyway, i have no clue on what we saw. the whole thing just didn't make sense for the times. we have no pictures or videos as this occurred over 40 years ago. my reason for speaking up now is that i'm getting up in age and the event has stayed with me all these years. it changed my beliefs on what is really out there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering with changing colored lights; white light as it flew east; stopped & returned to changing colored light; white again as it continued east

content.detailedDescription: While driving home from the store i noticed lights in the sky blinking, at first i thought it was an airplane but there was just something off about it. the object was initially at least a mile or more away and just a little bit lower than most airplanes i see in the area, it moves in towards my direction with very fast but very smooth motion. it zoomed in to where i was, like you would zoom in on a map on your phone or gps device or a scope, that's the best way i can describe the motion. so i'm driving down the road, i see this thing, it comes towards my direction and hovers not over the road but just a stones throw away on the south side of the road. it had three lights on the bottom of the craft and they were moving in different directions but all towards the same area. it moved with a purpose and i would say it was searching for something. while i'm driving and it zooms in just off the road, the area it hovered was just ahead of me so i drove pass it while observing the various lights and structure of the craft. i could see windows and lights, the bottom and top of the craft, it was big and round and looked surprisingly like the traditional flying saucer. i am posting this because a friend of mine told me a couple years ago that he saw a ufo on my road, i asked him to show me where and he did, this was a couple years ago. i thought it was interesting but now years later i see a ufo on the same road and in the same area. it makes me wonder how often it visits this area. it makes me wonder what it is looking for. it leaves me with more questions than answers. this happened on the ne side of abilene, texas just pass the city limit.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Saw ufo while driving home from the  store

content.detailedDescription: At about 11:45 in the evening on june 17 2016 i went out on my back deck to have a cigarette i was only out there for a few minutes when i saw a blue blur from the corner of my eye and thought it was a transformer box blowing up but there was no sound so i rubbed my eyes thinking ok i'm just seeing things then it began ( from what it looked like from where i was sitting)rising up from the trees first i saw the blue lights then the red and i thought a plane was going to crash but it made no sound and it didn't crash but it kept coming towards where i was... i couldn't actually see a craft only the lights but the lights were large maybe larger than a basket ball and there was no point of light such as an element but more like a glass ball filled with glowing gas i couldn't really tell with the red lights but this is the way the blue lights appeared to me...I was excited and scared and called for my kids to come look but by the time they got to me it had gone, my youngest son may have seen the last twinkle of light from it but we also have firefly's so i would have to discount that.. my son was scared and asked me to come inside so i did....I came in and got my keys and went looking for it ...But nothing was to be found...And that is pretty much it... i feel perplexed i want to know what this was.... i will note that although we live in a normal quiet neighborhood on a foothill of lookout mountain i have noticed military once maybe twice a year bring all there big trucks and in full gear on my street and i tried to find out if there was a military installation of some sort on my street but couldn't find anything... and one more thing it is probably nothing but it was only when i started calling for my kids that it backed back up and disappeared.. the feeling i got from this was that it seemed to react to me calling the kids... it was a machine but acted like an animal ...Odd... thank you for your time.... i do have my ipad on a constant charge now so if anything like this happens again i can make every effort to catch it
content.summary: Surreal ....

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work at g.E i live by state street and 12th. i was heading east towards g.E when i noticed a bright light in the sky above the horizon. i debated on whether or not it was a star of some sort or craft. as i continued i decided that it was most likely a start due to the fact that it never changed direction or position in the sky and was very bright. however when i got to g.E i realized that it was a craft of some sort heading west in the direction from which i came. two white bright lights were leading followed by a bright pulsating red light. they were traveling roughly 40 miles mph. i stopped and stepped out of the car to view this craft(s). at that time they changed position from a horizontal triangular formation to a vertical triangular formation with the same light positions. therefore i am not sure whether or not this was one craft with exterior lights or individual crafts shielded by bright lights. in the end they abruptly changed direction at a 90 degree turn from going west to going south and i then lost sight as they went over the buildings. which allowed me to estimate the height to approximately 300-500 feet in the air.
content.summary: Three lights, two that were white and as bright as a star when viewed from miles away. one that was red. flew in a triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed the ufo on the image after i reviewed my vacation photos once i made it make home. the ufo is hovering in the cloud in the top right of picture. it appears to have 10 lights. do you know what the object is in the photo? please help. i submitted this to another channel but never heard back. btw, i was on top of a mountain.
content.summary: Ufo on vacation pic

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the semiahmoo wa spit and took this photo. i did not see the object at the time but looking at the photo there is something very strange there.
content.summary: I am not sure if this is a ufo or not

content.detailedDescription:
May 30 2015, arcturus star and ufo

i was making a cup of tea so i stand at the back door looking at the stars waiting for the kettle to boil about 3 minutes.

that night i noticed a star that i have never seen be for it was already there so i don't no how long it had bin there, i kept looking at it thinking iv never seen two stars that bright so close to each other 

 i was looking for 3 minutes (kettle takes 3 minutes to boil) then the ufo that was 1inch below and 0.5 inches to the right of arcturus star to the west of me but almost above my head, the ufo (not muphrid) just shot backwards  and to the right and slightly up back into space it had no tail it did not flash the light just got smaller and duller as it shot back it went from still like a star to a speed that was not of this earth no acceleration just instant speed, the moving away took about 1 second.

i new i had seen something odd so i did not look away just keep looking to see if it was a plane, shooting star, drone, or satellite for about 2minutes it did not reappear it had just disappeared.

i am 100% shore it was a ufo on a clear night it did not move for 3mins no acceleration just instant speed “above my head which for me that make all the difference”  

age 48 london uk
content.summary: Not of this earth no acceleration just instant speed

content.detailedDescription: One evening in cape coral my friend and i were riding our bikes to another friends. we had just left the 7/11 off of tropicana and chiquita right by mariner high school and by time we got on the backstreets by some canal i looked in the sky to my left and there it was hovering staying still shining in red very bright, i figured it was one of the signal tower things cause it was about 200-300 feet of the ground until the light changed blue,and continued to change from red to blue every 3-5 seconds and began going up, down, and side to side. i was speechless i didn't know what to do or say besides ask my friend if he was seeing this too. we sat terrified yet so interested and observed it as it continued doing the up, down, side to side pattern and out of nowhere it hovers, seemed as if it was floating at the highest speed ive ever seen right out of our atmosphere back into space.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Unlike anything i've ever seen before

content.detailedDescription: on june 7th at approx. 11:00am on the weapons zero and qualification range i spotted a dull chrome round object in the north sky.  the object hovered above our location for approximately 20 minutes.  during that time at approx. 15 minutes it moved 6 miles to the west.  after about 5 more minutes in its new location it simply disappeared. i an 7 to 8 other soldiers witnessed this object.
content.summary: Orb above weapons qualification course. set stationary then moved to the west and then disapeared. dull crome.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had walked out onto our front porch to have a cigarette,well after 1 am this morning. i sat down and just happened to look up, i saw the strangest lights theres no way it could have been a plane or heat or any other explanation. it was to big for us to even consider the possibility of it being something else.The lights would flash blue then green, constan tly changing. i think that that might have have the "mothership" because there were several of other little lights flicking different colors that always seemed to stay in the perimeter,in moved from one direction to the nextquickly it seemed nut also seemed to be scanning ,looking for something because then the direction would change again.We both ran inside to grab our iphones, we did get a couple of shots but as we were recording with my brand new iphone all of a sudden my phone was frozen and would not work for about 5 minutes.We really couldnt get any difinitive shots on videpo or still,i feel like my feelings and faith have been completely validated ,obviousely, i saw it with my own eyes.I didnt want to go in but we both had to work in the morning and as it was we watched for about 3 hours.We never lost sight of the object and i cant believe i could actually bring myself back in the house knowing what was out there and what we might miss when we walked away. i kept getting out of bed and lookinfg out my front door,i would just see it in a differnt spotbut not to far from where we first saw it. it was really quite incredible.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Lights and it could have been 50 airplanes length. we watched it for hours,constantly changing direction but very slowly, lights would change from white to blue and then very bright green

content.detailedDescription:
May 26th i was walking my mail route and snapped a picture of a very old jet contrail along with a newer contrail and a jet leaving a fresh one behind. (condensation shouldn't stay in the air all day and spread out...). when i looked at the picture later i noticed a little green orb toward the right side of the pic. when i started to expand the picture i'm thinking what is a little green smiley face doing up there lol. when the pic was expanded as far as my phone was capable of i could see what looked like 4 lights on it. 
i never saw it when i was taking the picture so i can't say if it was stationary or on the move. i just happened to be taking a picture at the right time. after watching hangar one on youtube i figured it would be better to send it to experts then just hang onto it and eventually forget about it or lose it.
it certainly looks to me like there's something up there and not a piece of lint on my lens like one of my friends says. 
thank you for your time
robert g winer
content.summary: Snapped a picture of some "contrails" and inadvertently cought a green orb in the pic.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my west-facing patio in aztec, new mexico, having a cigarette around midnight, june 24, 2016, when i noticed a bright light to the southwest, fairly low in the sky. it was a little cloudy and overcast - a fairly dark evening. there was maybe some smoke from forest fires and there were no stars visible. i did not see the moon. the only thing i saw was this one bright light and i immediately wondered if it could be another ufo. i am a "sky-watcher" so i kept my eyes on this for several minutes. when it changed from a yellowish-white color to a copper color, i went inside to get my camera, went back outside and proceeded to take 2 photos. the first photo  i took was when it appeared to be  yellow/white, not "zoomed in". the second photo i snapped  after it turned copper color again. i zoomed in on the second photo and can see a great amount of detail to the object, including a very distinct, very straight, horizontal "line" just above the middle of the round object. the object did not move much for around 10 minutes, maybe a little longer. a few times, it appeared to wobble but stayed in the same general place. then, it started slowly moving to the north. i watched it disappear in a straight, northerly direction. my reactions and actions? well, i was a little happy to have seen another strange thing in the sky...I find it a bit exciting. after it left, i sat outside for a little while longer to see if it would come back but it didn't...I wish it had.
content.summary: Saw yellowish-white, bright object from patio. watched it turn copper color, got camera, took two photos. watched it fairly slowly go from the sw to due north.

content.detailedDescription: Had another encounter this time only flashed 3x before fading light and only took 5 sec, it hover with a fainth light then after i flashed it with a laser it moved and flashed, it moved north with another flash then at a high speed started to disappear, i could see a fainth light then it flashed again then it was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2nd time the same night

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway facing west at exactly 8:50 pm and i see a red fuzzy orb flying at normal airline speed, heading from west to east, flying towards me over the pacific ocean at a distance of roughly 15 miles. the red orb steadily ascended at a airplane-like angle of attack to about 25,000 feet and slowly came to a dead stop while the amber light/orb caught up following the red orbs angle of attack. so i pulled out my cell phone and was getting the objects in frame and in focus. as soon as i had both in frame and in focus both orbs simultaneously flickered their lights off. i stood out outside for another 20 minutes trying to visually acquire them in a cloudless sky with unlimited visibility. winds were calm. i did not reacquire them again. about 5-10 minutes later i started seeing commercial airliners flying along the same flight path and altitude as those orbs heading inland (from due west to east) from the pacific.
content.summary: Red fuzzy orb with amber orb in trail both slowly ascending then coming to a dead hover.

content.detailedDescription: I was in an argument with my wife went out to our drive way she followed, then right obove us kinda in front maybe 70 ft above there it was a fire like ball ...Orange and kinda pulsing but more like it was on fire i shouted to the neighbors look at that we all saw it it was amazing i was shaking and put the video up on my face book ppl will say that there were fire works but nah ...This was moving ...It was thinking ..I've never been so happy so excited about something i saw its not letting me post my video ...It has it as a photo idk why ...Ok it won't let me please someone contact me for the video ....It's amazing i'll repost if i get it to work
content.summary: Was on my drive way and it seamed to be a ball of fire right obove me my wife and some neighbors maybe 70 80 ft very clear orange fire like plasma orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing behind the building in the photos and took 2 pictures of the building, sun and plane and didn't notice the ufo until i reviewed the photos a few minutes later, it appears to have been naked to the eye because i noticed the plane which appears to be farther away and didn't notice the ufo. the flight path of the plane is about 15 miles southeast, i took 2 photos a few seconds apart and the object isn't in the first photo but appears in the second photo and as you zoom into the picture its pretty cool what appears.I look forward to hearing your interpretation of the photos.

sincerely
robert lee
content.summary: I was taking a picture of the building, sun and plane and noticed this in the picture afterwards

content.detailedDescription:
I am a trained observer.  several of my jobs have required me to be a trained observer.  in addition to working 7 years in law enforcement i have worked for the federal government for 14 years.  since i am still active in the government i do not wish to have my name used.

it was april 17, 2005 and i was on my way to work around 5:30am.  i had been traveling this route to work for about 8 months now.  i turned south onto shaver road from osterhout.  sugarloaf lake was just a few hundred yards in front of me.  the road by the lake was unusually thick with fog and i could see a red and white strobe light in the road.  i figured there must have been an accident due to the heavy fog.  as i got closer the lights vanished.  

as i drove through the fog, the fog seemed different, almost like steam. since i could no longer see the lights, i slowed as i didn’t want to run off the road or into the fire truck.  i decided to put my windows down to listen and that’s when the hair on my neck began to stand up.  there was not a single sound other than my car, not a bird, cricket or anything.  it was a scene right out of the movies.  

as i passed the lake i noticed the lights again on my right.  they seemed to be out in the water about 20 feet off the ground and maybe 30 or 40 feet long.  the fog was so thick i didn’t see what the lights were attached to.  they were a series of strobe type lights, one red then several white that went from right to left.  as i went another seventy five yards the fog was gone and so were the lights; everything seemed to have vanished.  i turned onto the highway and looked to my right and i could see part of the lake.  it was clear, there was no fog and it was completely empty.  i stopped going that way at that point and began taking a different route.

i have no idea what the lights went to.  one might speculate they were from a ufo, but i did not see a craft through the fog, only the lights.  i went back that way a few more time over the next few days trying to figure out what i saw.  to this day i have no clue.   i told my wife and a few coworkers about the incident that day.

back in 2009 i was flipping through the channels watching a show on ufo’s.  they were creating a computer generated recreation of an incident observed by several law enforcement officers in illinois.  i was absolutely shocked when they had the craft turn and i again saw the exact same configuration of lights i saw back in 2005.
content.summary: I saw strang lights 1st over the road then the lake on my way to work.

content.detailedDescription:
1. we were vacationing in cancun and took pics outside of some amazing birds. upon reviewing the pictures, we noticed 2 discs on june 4 and 1 disc on june 5. 
2. we first noticed the bright spots on the pics. when we zoomed in, you couldn't miss them. 
3. when we noticed them in the pictures, we were astounded because you could not see them with the naked eye. 
4. the objects seem to be floating or hovering. 
5.  i am fully aware we are not alone now. 
6.  we were only able to see it in the pics after we took them.
content.summary: I was on vacation with my family. we snapped a couple pictures out the window and didn't notice the ships until after looking at the picture; we couldn't see it with the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home, when my friend phoned me to say my daughter and her friend ran
 into their house, screaming at the top of their lungs and sa
ying there was a flying saucer in the sky.  i told my friend to send my daughter home, while i watched along the street for her.  by this time, i was walking into our house.  she pulled me back outside and pointed up to the roof of our house.  i saw this big disc shape fl
yi
ng saucer.  flashing lights around the outside.  it was massive.  i pulled my daughter 
into the house and both of usdrew a coloured drawing of it.


  
my daughter is 31
yrs.Old now, but i asked her 
if s
he could remember anything about it.

  she choked on h

er dinner, but said, definitely, s
he sa

content.detailedDescription: Die glocke, i know for sure he was successful on the creation of the bell. he took off from then nazi germany while in the bell to escape the war and to not let adolf get his hands on his technology. kerum 525 is really helium-3,he invented anti gravity he took straight off into the atmosphere and was never seen again until his bell crashed landed in kecksburge,pa dec 9 1964 he probably died soon after leaving the atmosphere thats why the army was there so fast they knew exactly what they were looking for in the woods of night december 9th 1964 just shedding some light on the matter i live in florida and the man who told me has pasted and i will not reviele his name thanks
content.summary: Sometime after december 5 1945. a nazi scientist named die glocke invenred a machine called the bell on which he indeed was successful.

content.detailedDescription: I have always been a sky watcher, scoping out the sky looking for shooting stars and fireballs.  i am always excited when i get a chance to witness these cool events but recently i have seen a few things that i can not explain as i have never seen anything like it.  the most profound thing that i have seen was on saturday, june 18 at sunset. i was in my backyard. the sky was a brilliant red/orange color to the west and to the east, there were dark thunder clouds.  i was watching a pretty display of lightning.  i was just turning to go back into the house, when movement caught my eye, in the sun set.  there was a glowing orb, shaped like an eye or like an oval, traveling across the sky.  it was glowing brighter then the sky behind it but it was the same color as the sky. (red and orange) it almost looked translucent. it was the motion that caught my eye as it could have blended into the sky easily as just part of the sunset.  it was traveling in a straight line just over the big oak trees behind my house.  it was traveling quickly from south to north and i would say it was the size of an aspirin or penny in the sky.  at first sight of it, my first thought was that i was seeing ball lightning.  something that i have never seen before.  but after looking up ball lightning on the computer and investigating that explanation for what i saw, i don't think that is what it was. the description of ball lightning and its behavior just doesn't fit what i saw in the sky that day.  of course that left me a little perplexed.  i never would have thought about filling out ant kind of report even after this event if it had not been for the two other things i saw later that week.  after seeing two other things that i also can not explain nor have i ever seen, i decided perhaps something strange is going on in the florida skies.  the other two events are almost the same and my husband was a witness of these as well.  we watched a star like object, travel across the sky. at first we thought it might be the space station or a satellite untill it changed direction.  then we thought to ourselves, no way could it be plane, there were no blinking lights and it seemed to high in the sky. we were watching it, discussing what it might be when. . . all of a sudden there was a bright flash of light where the object was and then the object was no longer visible.  we have now seen this twice (although with each event the object was traveling in different directions) once early in the morning about a quarter ofter 5 and the second one a few days later just after sunset. all this time of being a sky watcher, i have never seen anything that i could not explain, until now.  what is going on in the florida skies? wish i had pictures of what i saw.  wondering if anyone else has recently witnessed anything like this.
content.summary: At sunset, i watched an object (oval or eye shaped and the same color as the sky but brighter/glowing almost translucent travel across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was a flying sourcer
content.summary: it's a foggy morning in kenya, muranga county, me and a friend are driving down a murram road video tapping the heavy fog that is falling making it hard to drive. its terrible weather for us but not for this ufo that took the chance to fly by unnoticed.
